Currently when we are running an autonomous path using pathplanner, the path executes but then our robot would immediately drive full speed in a random direction once the path finishes. I’ve checked the log files and I don’t see any intermittent CAN bus errors as well. Currently under the getAutonomous() method we simply have a “return new (auto here)” line. Does anyone else have this issue? Would using a sendablechooser
